name: Factory Run
description:
Our entry to the GMTK 2020 Game Jam!

CREDITS - MEET THE TEAM:

Lucas Campos - Coder
MatheusSturm - Coder / Artist
Cirbble - Level Design
Marcelo - Sound Designer / Composer

Lets craft and deliver products.

Simple right?

WRONG! Because you lack control of the item dispenser hahaha

So how do we craft them?

It's pretty simple. Pick up items with 'Space', use item with the combiner machine with the 'F' key. When you have the right items inside you can then press "E" to turn the machine on. Now you have the product done! We just need to deliver it.

To deliver a product, just press "F" key near the deliver bench to deposit it. Each correct delivery  add points to your score.

Now you are ready to go and test out game concept. Good luck!

We aim to improve art, fix bugs and expand the game later :D
